column1: Local Foods////After seeing and reading all the advertisements and articles about Local Foods opening
column2: I had to try it out.  I'm a big fan of Benjy's
column3: and I immediately became excited when I heard about their new venture into the deli world. Located right next door to the Benjy's in Rice Village (where the former Antone's was)
column4: Local Foods has an industrial and airy (maybe too much space?) feel to it. For a Saturday
column5: it wasn't crowded at all with plenty of tables for lunch service.
